hero.subline: Electrical Engineering student (Electronics & Communications), ICPC World Finalist and ACPC medalist with deep experience in algorithms, data structures, and coaching. 6K+ solved problems across major online judges.

items.q: What are Anas’s main areas of expertise?
items.a: Competitive Programming, Algorithms, Data Structures, and training problem-solving skills.
